com.dreamoval.android.pixtern.card

Class CardValidationActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.dreamoval.android.pixtern.card.CardValidationActivity

  • public class CardValidationActivity
extends Activity
    This class provides functionality to upload a picture and validate different facial features.

    • Method Detail

      • onResume

        public void onResume()

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
        Sets up the activity according to the specified rules in the rules file after OpenCV initialisation has been successful.

      • copyResources

        public void copyResources(int resId)
        Saves the language data for tesseract in the ExternalDirectory of the phone.
        Parameters:
        resId - ID of the language data in the res/raw folder.

      • templateMatching

        public void templateMatching(int match_method,
                    int res,
                    java.lang.String resName,
                    double thresh)
        Checks if the pattern can be found in the given area of interest and sets up feedback.
        Parameters:
        match_method - Match Methods supported by OpenCV.
        res - ID of the resource pattern in the res directory.
        resName - Name of the resource to be returned.
        thresh - Threshold the best detection has to pass in order to be a successful detection.

      • getTemplate

        public void getTemplate()
        Reads the rules template file and sets up card object accordingly.

      • setDetectionTemplate

        public void setDetectionTemplate()
        Sets up a card object with a single Pattern of every Card specified in the rules File. Tries to match every Pattern to the given image.

      • getFoundCard

        public java.lang.String getFoundCard(java.lang.String resName)
        Called after a pattern of the sample Card used for card Detection passes. Returns the card the pattern is a part of.
        Parameters:
        resName - Name of the Pattern that passed the detection.
        Returns:
        Name of the card that was detected.

      • fetchTextNew

        public void fetchTextNew(java.lang.String resName)
        Fetches the text from the specified area.
        Parameters:
        resName - name of the text pattern.
